scripts.install-all: npm i && cd ../client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i && cd ../dev
scripts.db:init: docker-compose exec server npm run db:init
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose exec server npm run db:reset
scripts.heroku:push-server: git -C ../ subtree push --prefix server heroku-server master
scripts.heroku:push-client: git -C ../ subtree push --prefix client heroku-client master
